name: Aberrant Fossil
description:
More Chaos modifiers
No Lightning modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Fungal Caverns and Abyssal Depths biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Aetheric Fossil
description:
More Caster modifiers
Fewer Attack modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Mines and Sulphur Vents biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Bloodstained Fossil
description:
Corrupted
Has a Corrupted implicit modifier
dropRestrictions: Drops from completing a Stonewood Hollow node in Petrified Forest biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Bound Fossil
description: More Minion, Aura or Curse modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Petrified Forest and Abyssal Depths biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Corroded Fossil
description:
More Physical Ailment or Chaos Ailment modifiers
No Elemental modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Fungal Caverns and Petrified Forest biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Deft Fossil
description:
More Critical modifiers
No Attribute modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Magma Fissure biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Dense Fossil
description:
More Defence modifiers
No Life Modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Fungal Caverns and Petrified Forest biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Faceted Fossil
description: More Gem modifiers
dropRestrictions: Drops from completing a Molten Cavity node in Magma Fissure biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Fractured Fossil
description:
Creates a split copy
Cannot be used to split Influenced,
Enchanted, Fractured, or Synthesised items
dropRestrictions: Drops from completing a Humid Fissure node in Sulphur Vents biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Frigid Fossil
description:
More Cold modifiers
No Fire modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Frozen Hollow biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Fundamental Fossil
description:
More Attribute modifiers
No Critical modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Magma Fissure and Sulphur Vents biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Gilded Fossil
description: Item is overvalued by vendors
dropRestrictions: Found in Fungal Caverns and Abyssal Depths biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Glyphic Fossil
description: Has a Corrupt Essence modifier
dropRestrictions: Drops from completing a Time-Lost Cavern node in Frozen Hollow biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Hollow Fossil
description: Has an Abyssal socket
dropRestrictions: Drops from completing a Crystal Spire node in Abyssal Depths biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Jagged Fossil
description:
More Physical modifiers
No Chaos modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Petrified Forest biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Lucent Fossil
description:
More Mana modifiers
No Speed modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Abyssal Depths biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Metallic Fossil
description:
More Lightning modifiers
No Physical modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Mines and Sulphur Vents biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Opulent Fossil
description:
More Drop modifiers
No Tagless modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Fungal Caverns and Sulphur Vents biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Prismatic Fossil
description:
More Elemental modifiers
No Physical Ailment or Chaos Ailment modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Magma Fissure and Frozen Hollow biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Pristine Fossil
description:
More Life modifiers
No Defence modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Mines and Magma Fissure biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Sanctified Fossil
description:
Numeric modifier values are lucky
High Level modifiers are more common
dropRestrictions: Found in Frozen Hollow and Petrified Forest biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Scorched Fossil
description:
More Fire modifiers
No Cold modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Magma Fissure biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Serrated Fossil
description:
More Attack modifiers
Fewer Caster modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Mines and Frozen Hollow biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Shuddering Fossil
description:
More Speed modifiers
No Mana modifiers
dropRestrictions: Found in Frozen Hollow biomes in the Azurite Mine.

name: Tangled Fossil
description:
Makes a random modifier type much more likely and prevents 
another random modifier type
Effects revealed once resonator is fully socketed
dropRestrictions: Drops from completing a Haunted Tomb node in Fungal Caverns biomes in the Azurite Mine.
